name: Website Development
description: I specialize in creating custom websites that are not only visually appealing but also functional and user-friendly. From simple landing pages to complex web applications, I have the expertise to bring your ideas to life.

name: Front-end Development
description: I excel in crafting intuitive user interfaces (UI) using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Your website will be responsive and optimized for a seamless experience on all devices.

name: Back-end Development
description: I can build the server-side components of your web application using technologies like Node.js, Express, and databases such as MongoDB. Your data will be stored securely, and your website will run efficiently.

name: E-commerce Solutions
description: If you're looking to sell products or services online, I can set up a robust e-commerce platform for your business. From product listings to secure payment processing, I'll ensure a smooth online shopping experience for your customers.

name: Website Maintenance
description: Keeping your website up-to-date is essential. I offer ongoing maintenance services, including regular backups, security updates, and content updates, to ensure your site remains secure and relevant.
